headline: Is General Mills (GIS) Using Protein Cereals to Reposition Its Core Brand Strategy?
summary: Earlier this month, lifestyle and sports nutrition brand GHOST® announced with General Mills the launch of two high‑protein cereals, GHOST® PROTEIN CEREAL x CINNAMON TOAST CRUNCH™ and GHOST® PROTEIN CEREAL x LUCKY CHARMS™, each offering 17g of protein and added calcium per serving. This expansion of protein‑enhanced classics highlights General Mills’ push into functional nutrition even as it faces softer volumes and a tougher consumer backdrop. We’ll now explore how General Mills’ weaker...
